item.title: Serenity Rose
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Serenity Rose

When you can float through the air and conjure up monsters out of ectoplasm, you’re bound to attract attention! Come stare at Ms. Serenity Rose, local witch, as she spends the day dodging goblins, Goths, and a bad case of social phobia in the spookiest li’l town in America…!

item.title: Rebel Angels
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Rebel Angels

Welcome to Hell! As the Infernal Regime prepares to lay siege to Thermidor and purge Baal, the Arch-traitor, Lightbringer Nolous gives disgraced Infernal Knight Balthazar the chance to reclaim his place as Hell’s foremost warrior by leading the attack, but his real agenda is far more sinister…

item.title: The Cartoon Guidebook to Absolute Failure
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Cartoon Guidebook to Absolute Failure

Greetings, potential buyer! Do you like failing, miserably? Well, good news! Because now there’s a book that’s been made just for you: The Cartoon Guidebook To Absolute Failure. Written by Erik Craddock, and Illustrated by Logan Faerber. In the first issue, learn how to fail at such topics as fending off vampires, stopping grizzly bear attacks, slaying a dragon, mowing your lawn, and so much more!

item.title: Bloody Dreadful
item.description:
打包下载📦仍在工事中

Bloody Dreadful

The hot new horror series from indie artist Justin Sane! Done in the spirit of 1950s horror comic classics, this terrifying book will revolve around The Grave Robber, who loots the dead in Victorian England and has the special gift of being able to see the pasts of the corpses he meets. Along for the ride is his easily-frightened Dog, who cowers at the lurid and shocking tales the cemetery provides.
